mapper.update: UPDATE common_file SET isDelete = 1 WHERE id = #{id};
UPDATE common_file SET isDelete = 1 WHERE rId = #{rId} and type = 1;
mapper.select: SELECT cf.id, cf.rId, cf.filePath, cf.fileName, cf.type, cf.createTime, cf.creator FROM common_file cf LEFT JOIN album_name an on cf.rId = an.id WHERE cf.type = 1 and cf.isDelete = 0 and an.groupId = #{groupId} ORDER BY createTime DESC LIMIT ${topNum}

SELECT cf.id, cf.rId, cf.filePath, cf.fileName, cf.type, cf.createTime, cf.creator FROM common_file cf WHERE cf.type = 2 and cf.isDelete = 0 and cf.rId = #{groupId} ORDER BY createTime DESC LIMIT ${topNum}
